description: Collaborated with developers to redesign the company's web app using Figma.
Curated a comprehensive collection of 2D and 3D furniture assets for the company's digital floor planner
Created an order management system to enhance tracking of current and past orders, optimizing operational efficiency
Contributed to team efforts and excelled in solo tasks to deliver a high-quality product
Served as an IT intern, applying AV editing skills to support advertisement and production initiatives
Collaborated closely with peers over social media platforms to assist with customer accquistion
Honed leadership, time management, and communication skills, gaining insight into my chosen career path
Dual role performance as host and audio technician for the cohort's live final presentation
